H0.text: Which band released the 1970 album 'In the Wake of Poseidon'. King Crimson

H1.text: Which band released the 1970 album 'In the Wake of Poseidon'. Emerson, Lake & Palmer

H2.text: Which band released the 1970 album 'In the Wake of Poseidon'. Gentle Giant

H3.text: Which band released the 1970 album 'In the Wake of Poseidon'. Crimso

A4.text: In the Wake of Poseidon is the second studio album by English progressive rock group King Crimson, released in May 1970
